Options
That is the last customer.
Use mouse click to navigate.
Before open orders you have to restock ingredients.
Indonesian: Sebelum membuka warung, kau harus restok dulu.

English: Click the place with balloon to restock.
Indonesian: Klik di tempat yang ada tanda piring kosong nya.

English: Good job now we're ready to open order.
Indonesian: Bagus! Sekarang kita siap buka warung.

English: You must have at least \G 5000 to start operational.
Now click the open order balloon to start operational.
Indonesian: Klik open order untuk memulai jualan.

English: Close Store?
You don't have any stock to sell.
Indonesian: Kau tak punya apapun untuk dijual.

English: To open the restaurant,
Indonesian: Untuk membuka warung kau harus bayar

English: you must pay an operational fee of \G 5000 per day.
You don't have enough money for the operational costs.
Indonesian: Kau tak punya cukup uang untuk bayar operasional.

English: Open Store?
You can see on the top right
Indonesian: Kau bisa lihat di kanan atas layar ada sebuah gauge

English: there is a gauge that shows how long the day will last.
Indonesian: yang menunjukkan sisa waktu hari ini.

English: Customers will stop coming after the day is over,
Indonesian: Pelanggan akan berhenti datang jika hari berakhir,

English: but you can still serve customers.
Indonesian: tapi kau masih bisa melayani pelanggan.

English: Now wait until a customer come.
Indonesian: Sekarang tunggu sampai pelanggan pertamamu datang.

English: Serve your customer and increase your reputation.
As you increase your reputation,
customer interval will increase.
New recipes available.
Open recipe or inspect the place to unlock new recipe.
Indonesian:
Buka resep atau perika tanda "NEW"
untuk membuka resep baru.

English: Unlock recipe will increase opening time.
Indonesian:
Membuka resep membuatmu bisa
membua warung lebih lama.

English: Unlock
recipe will cost
Do you want to unlock?
You don't have enough money.
You unlock
Opening time increased by 10 seconds.
Smoking customers will wait longer.
Indonesian:
Sambil sebat, pelanggan perokok
akan menunggu lebih lama.

English: is available.
You can unlock
Promo is ongoing!
From today you can get stock promo!!
Indonesian: Mulai hari ini kau bisa mendapat promo!

English:
Items with discount will appear
in the list on the right side.
Indonesian:
Stock yang mendapat promo
akan muncul di sebelah kanan.

English: Watch Ad
Congratulations! You can open the shop for free.
Indonesian: Selamat! Kamu bisa membuka toko dengan gratis.

English: It looks like you placed the wrong order.
Or the customer who ordered has left.
Indonesian: Atau pelanggan yang pesan sudah pergi.

English: You can reset your order at the sink.
Indonesian: Kau bisa reset pesananmu di wastafel.

English: Good job!
You successfully delivered your first order.
Now let your wife deliver it to the customer.
Indonesian:
Sekarang biarkan istrimu
yang mengantarkannya ke pelanggan.

English: Just focus on taking orders and cooking.
Indonesian: Kau fokus saja terima pesanan dan memasak.

English: Back to work...

You can see the items you
are carrying on the right side of the screen.
Indonesian:
Kau bisa melihat item yang kau bawa
di bagian kanan layar.

English:
To track whether you have brought
the appropriate utensils and ingredients.
Indonesian:
Untuk memastikan apakah kau telah
membawa bahan dan alat yang tepat.

English: You can reset your carrying in the sink.
Indonesian: Kau bisa reset bawaanmu di wastafel.

English:
You've run out of money, and there aren't
enough ingredients to prepare any recipes.
Indonesian:
Kau kehabisan uang, dan kau tak punya
cukup bahan untuk masak.

English: Your first customer is arrived.
Click on the customer to receive order.
Indonesian: Klik pada pelanggan untuk menerima pesanan.

English: Quick! dont make the customer pile up queue.

A customer leaves the restaurant
because there is too much queue.
Indonesian:
Seorang pelanggan meninggalkan warung
karena antrian terlalu panjang.

English: \Item[\V[21]] & \Item[\V[22]] please.
\Item[\V[21]] please.
\Item[\V[22]] please.
It seems you are out of stock.
Congratulations on getting your first customer.

Immediately make the order
according to the requested order.
If you don't know how to make the order.
Indonesian: Kalau kau tak tahu gimana cara bikin pesanannya.

English:
You can open the recipe to see
the tools and ingredients needed.
Indonesian:
Kau bisa buka resep untuk lihat
alat dan bahan yang diperlukan.

English: Go make the order!
The customers will leave if you take too long.
Indonesian: Pelanggan akan pergi jika kau terlalu lama.

English: I order \Item[\V[21]] & \Item[\V[22]]
I order \Item[\V[21]]
I order \Item[\V[22]]
Order delivered
You don't have enough money.

I know you need money, and I can help you.
But you must pay the installments every sunset.
Indonesian:
Aku tahu kau butuh uang, aku bisa bantu.
Tapi kau harus bayar cicilan
tiap matahari terbenam.

English: \>Take the offer?<center><Auto>

The interest is 10% per day,
to be paid along with the installments.
Indonesian:
Bunganya 10% per hari,
dibayar langsung sama cicilan.

English: How much would you like to borrow?
Do you think you can manage without my help?
Indonesian: Kau pikir bisa melakukannya tanpa bantuanku?

English: You can't do anything if you don't have money.
Indonesian: Kau tak bisa melakukan apapun kalau tak punya uang.

English: How many days would you like to pay in installments?

Starting today, you must pay \V[105]
at the end of each day for \V[103] days.
Indonesian:
Per hari ini, kau harus bayar \V[105]
saat hari berakhir selama \V[103] hari.

English: \>Deal?<center><Auto>
It seems like my business here is done.
Indonesian: Nampaknya urusanku di sini telah selesai

English:
As you ran out of money,
suddenly, a mysterious figure appears.
Indonesian:
Saat kau kehabisan uang,
tiba-tiba seseorang misterius datang.

English: The day is over.
It's a shame that a customer leaves the restaurant.
Indonesian: Sayang sekali pelanggan itu meninggalkan warung.

English:
Customers will leave the restaurant
if they wait too long.
Indonesian: Pelanggan akan pergi jika menunggu terlalu lama.

English:
Good job!
You successfully made your first order.
Indonesian:
Good job!
Kau berhasil membuat pesanan pertamamu!

English: Now, take that order to the delivery table.
Indonesian: Taruh pesanan itu di meja pengantar.

English: You can always check the order list on the left screen.
Indonesian: Kau selalu bisa mengecek pesanan di kiri layar.

English: I order
I order
Your money is not enough to pay the debt.
Indonesian: Uangmu tidak cukup untuk membayar hutang.

English: You paid an installment of \G \V[111].

TODAY'S SUMMARY
\V[62] Customers .
\V[65] Satisfied customers.
\V[64] Disappointed customers today
Indonesian:
RINGKASAN HARI INI
\V[62] Pelanggan .
\V[65] Pelanggan puas.
\V[64] Pelanggan kecewa.

English:
\V[63] Meals served today.
You earned \V[67] reputation points today.
The customer interval will be \V[44] seconds.
\G \V[66] Earned.
Indonesian:
\V[63] Makanan disajikan.
Kau dapat \V[67] poin reputasi.
Pelanggan akan datang tiap \V[44] detik.
\V[66] \G Dihasilkan.

English:
\G \V[68] Spent.
Profit : \G \V[69]
\V[51] Days remaining until delivery.
You need \G \V[48] more for the delivery.
Indonesian:
\V[68] \G Dikeluarkan.
Keuntungan : \V[69] \G
\V[51] Hari tersisa hingga persalinan.
Kau butuh \V[48] \G lagi untuk biaya persalinan.

English: You managed to collect enough money for the birth expenses.
Indonesian:
Kau berhasil mengumpulkan uang
yang cukup untuk persalinan

English: The baby is coming....!
Good Job!
You successfully run your shop today.
Do a restock and get ready to open the shop again.
Indonesian: Lakukan restock dan bersiap untuk buka lagi.

English: You must earn 1,000,000 \G before 60 days.
Indonesian: Kau harus menghasilkan 1 juta \G sebelum 60 hari.

English: Good luck!

You are a happily married man,
filled with excitement and love.
Indonesian:
Kau baru saja menikah,
hari ini dipenuhi kebahagiaan dan cinta.\|

English:
You’ve just tied the knot
with the best wife in the world
Indonesian:
Kau baru saja mengikat janji suci
dengan seorang wanita terbaik di dunia.

English:
and together, you've invested all your
savings into purchasing your dream home.
Indonesian:
Bersamaan dengan itu,
kau telah menginvestasikan semua tabunganmu
untuk membeli rumah impianmu.\|\|

English:
The future seems bright, and you're ready
to start your new life together.
Indonesian:
Masa depan nampak cerah,
untuk memulai hidup baru bersama.

English:
But as you arrive at the house
you've worked so hard for,
Indonesian:
Tapi... Saat kau tiba di rumah
yang telah kau perjuangkan.

English: something unexpected happens.
The doors are locked,

and a government notice is posted on the gate:
your property has been seized.
Indonesian:
Ada sebuah pesan ditempel di gerbang:
Bangunan ini disita.\|\|

English: The developer you trusted has scammed you,
Indonesian: Developer yang kau percaya telah menipumu.

English:
and now, you are left with nothing
but your wife by your side.
Indonesian:
Sekarang kau tak punya apapun,
selain istrimu di sampingmu.

English:
You try to reason with the authorities,
but it's no use.
Indonesian:
Kau mencoba bernegosiasi dengan pihak terkait,
tapi tetap sia-sia.

English: The house is gone.
All your savings have been poured into this dream,
Indonesian: Seluruh tabunganmu telah terkuras untuk impianmu ini.

English: and now, it's been taken away.

You have nothing left'except
the love and support of your wife.
Indonesian:
Kau tak punya apa-apa lagi
selain kasih sayang dan dukungan dari istrimu.

English:
To make matters worse, your parents
disapproved of your marriage,
Indonesian: Lebih buruknya lagi, orang tuamu tak merestui pernikahanmu.

English: and you cannot go back to them.
You're stranded, broke, and overwhelmed by despair.
Indonesian: Kau jatuh miskin, dan tenggelam dalam keputusasaan.

English:
In this moment of hopelessness,
you start to consider walking away,
Indonesian:
Pada momen penuh keputusasaan itu,
kau mulai berpikir untuk menyerah.

English: maybe letting your wife return to her family,
Indonesian: Kau ingin membiarkan istrimu kembali ke orang tuanya.

English: so she can have a better life than this.
Indonesian: Sehingga dia bisa punya kehidupan yang lebih baik.

English: But then, she appears.
With a steaming bowl of instant noodles...
and a cup of coffee...
she sits beside you.
Her smile remains unwavering,

and she says,
'Don't give up. I have some good news...
I'm pregnant.'
Indonesian:
Dia pun berkata
"Jangan menyerah... Aku punya kabar baik.
Aku Hamil"\|

English: Despite your fears,

the news fills you with
a new sense of determination.
You can't give up now.
Her words spark a fire in you.

You may have lost everything else,
but you still have each other.
Indonesian:
Kau mungkin kehilangan segalanya,
tapi kalian tetap saling memiliki.

English:
Together, you come up with an idea:
you'll open a humble little food stall selling
your favorite comfort food'instant noodles.
Indonesian:
Muncul sebuah ide:
Kau akan membuka sebuah warmindo
yang menyajikan mie instant favoritmu.\|\|

English:
In Indonesia, this type of
small eatery is known as a 'Warmindo'
Indonesian: Warung kecil sederhana tempat orang bisa makan dan bersantai.

English:
a casual spot where people gather
to enjoy affordable and delicious noodle dishes.
Indonesian:
Sebuah tempat santai dimana orang bisa berkumpul
menikmati sajian lezat yang terjangkau.

English: You decide to name it Warmindo \N[3]
Indonesian: Kau memutuskan untuk memberinya nama Warmindo \N[3]

English:
Representing both the warmth of
the food and the essence of home.
Indonesian: Merepresentasikan hangatnya makanan dan esensi dari rumah.

English:
With your wife's help, you set up your
Warmindo and give it everything you've got.
Indonesian:
Dengan bantuan istrimu, kau membuka Warmindo mu
dan mengerahkan semua yang kau bisa.

English: The road is long and tough,

but each day brings you closer to your goal:
saving enough money for your child's birth.
Indonesian:
Tapi tiap hari membawamu lebih dekat dari tujuanmu:
Mengumpulkan uang yang cukup untuk biaya pesalinan.

English:
Despite your hard work and dedication,
it's just not enough.
Indonesian: Dedikasi dan kerja keras saja tidak cukup.

English: The bills keep piling up, and the pressure mounts.
You're drowning in debt.

And then, a loan shark knocks on your door.
He's come to collect.
Indonesian: Rentenir pun datang mengetuk pintu rumahmu.

English: He destroys your Warmindo...

Seizes everything you've worked for,
and has you thrown into jail.
Indonesian:
Merampas segala yang telah kau perjuangkan,
dan melemparkanmu ke dalam penjara.

English:
Alone, you sit in your cold, dark cell, regret and
failure weighing heavily on your heart.
Indonesian:
Kau duduk sendirian dalam dinginya tembok hotel prodeo.
Gelap, sesal dan kegagalan menyelimuti hatimu.

English: Your wife, with her unborn child, has left you.
Indonesian:
Istrimu, beserta anak dalam kandungannya,
pergi meninggalkanmu.

English: Against all odds, your Warmindo becomes a success.
Slowly but surely, the money starts to come in.
Indonesian: Perlahan tapi pasti, pendapatan mulai masuk.

English:
It's not glamorous, but it's enough
to keep your head above water.
Indonesian: Tidak mewah, tapi cukup untuk hidup.

English:
Your wife, your child, and you'working side by side in
your humble Warmindo, day after day.
Indonesian:
Istrimu, anakmu, dan kau... Saling membantu di
Warmindo sederhana itu hari ke hari.

English:
Through long hours, hard work, and unwavering love,
you build a life together.
Indonesian:
Melawati banyak waktu, kerja keras,
dan cinta tak tergoyahkan.
Kalian membangun hidupmu bersama.

English:
In the warmth of your little eatery,
surrounded by laughter,
Indonesian:
Kehangatan dari warung kecilmu.
Dikelilingi oleh tawa

English: joy, and the scent of freshly made noodles,
Indonesian: kebahagiaan, dan aroma segar dari mie instant.

English: you realize that, no matter how tough life gets,
Indonesian: Kau menyadari, seberapa keras hidup yang kau jalani.

English: as long as you have each other, you've truly won.
Indonesian: Selama kau memiliki satu sama lain, kau telah menang.

English: And so, your journey continues.
From despair to hope, from struggle to triumph,
Indonesian:
Dari keputusasaan menuju harapan,
dari perjuangan menuju kemenangan,

English: you've learned that sometimes,
the greatest treasures aren't the things you lose'
Indonesian: harta paling berharga bukan sesuatu yang telah hilang

English: but the love and strength you find in each other,
Indonesian: melainkan cinta dan kekuatan yang kau miliki satu sama lain

English: and what you're willing to create together.
Indonesian: dan sesuatu yang rela kalian ciptakan bersama.

English: Your Warmindo holds on, but it's still not enough.
Indonesian:
Warmindomu berhasil bertahan,
tapi itu masih belum cukup.

English: You scrape by, barely making ends meet.
Indonesian:
Kau hidup pas-pasan hampir
tak mampu memenuhi kebutuhan.

English: But when the day arrives for your child to be born,
you realize you've spent every last cent on medical bills.
Indonesian:
Kau menyadari telah menggunakan
semua uangmu untuk biaya rumah sakit.

English: As you try to figure out how to make it through,
the loan shark appears, demanding payment.
He drags you off to prison.
In the cold, lonely confines of your cell,
Indonesian: Di dalam jeruji besi yang dingin, kau merasa kesepian

English: you think back to all you've lost.
Indonesian: Kau meratapi semua hal yang telah diambil darimu.

English: But then, a surprise visit.

Your wife and child stand before you,
their love still strong.
Indonesian:
Istri dan anakmu datang mengunjungimu,
kasih sayang mereka masih kuat.

English:
Though your future remains uncertain,
you know you're not truly alone.
Indonesian:
Meski masa depanmu masih tidak pasti,
minimal kau tahu kalau kau tak sendirian.
